posts.author: darktooth
posts.content: As per my understanding, Bigby 7 and 9 are identical in how they work. The spells work in two steps: hand must first hit the target then succeed in a grapple check. I am not sure how the first step works. According to nwnwiki, hands must first make a specialized attack roll (d20 plus adding caster level and ability modifier) against the target’s armor class. If the roll is 20, will it always proceed to the second step of the spell? Basically, does this roll follow the rule that an unmodified attack roll of 20 always hits?

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
There is no mention of a Nat 20 making the success of this spell automatic;

It is a special attack roll.
